鮸字的基本解释

鮸
miǎn
一种鱼，头长而尖，口大，牙锐。体长而侧扁，暗褐色。腹灰白色。生活于海洋中。亦称“米鱼”、“鳘鱼”。

鮸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miǎn］
［《廣韻》亡辨切，上獮，明。］
鱼名。也称米鱼、鳘鱼。鱼纲石首鱼科。体长，侧扁，灰褐色。口大，头尖长，尾呈楔状。为常见食用鱼类。我国沿海均产。

鮸字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮸； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1470第18
【唐韻】亡辨切【集韻】美辨切，?音免。【說文】魚名。出薉邪國。又【正字通】石首魚，一名鮸，生東南海中，形如白魚，扁身弱骨細鱗，頭中白石二，腹內白鰾可作膠。嶺表錄謂之石頭魚，浙志謂之江魚，乾者名鯗魚。又【集韻】武遠切，音挽。義同。

Owl
Basic explanation of words
Owl
miǎn
A fish with a long, pointed head, large mouth and sharp teeth. The body is long and flat, dark brown. Belly gray. Live in the ocean. Also known as "rice fish" and "fish".
Owl
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［miǎn］
["Guangyun" is dead and cut, go up, Ming. ]
The name of the fish. It is also called rice fish and eel fish. Fish class Tothocephalidae. The body is long, flat on the side, and grayish brown. The mouth is large, the head is long, and the tail is wedge-shaped. It is a common edible fish. my country's coastal areas are produced.
Owl
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鮸; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1470 Page 18
[Tang Yun] Distinguish and cutting the death [Jiyun] Distinguishing and cutting beautifully, the sound is free. [Said the text] The name of the fish. Out of the evil country. Also [Zhengzitong] Shitou, an owl, born in the southeast sea, shaped like a white fish, flat body, weak bones and fine scales, white stone in the head, and white swim bladder can be used as glue. Lingbiao records called the stone fish, Zhejiang Zhizhi called the river fish, and the dry one was called the carp. Also 【Ji Yun】Wu Yuan cut, sound pull. The same meaning.
